Basalt 1.7

User friendly

Basalt's intuitive interface makes UI design a breeze, even for beginners. Experience seamless integration without the steep learning curve.

High Performance

Designed with efficiency in mind, Basalt ensures smooth and responsive interfaces, even for the most complex applications.

Modular Design

With a rich set of objects and modules, Basalt allows you to craft custom experiences, scaling up or down based on your needs.
